name: Nathaniel Mohr
about: An interesting thing about me is that I enjoy running and specifically long distance running. When I say long distance running I am talking about ultramarathons. I am currently training for my first ultra, a 50K, but am hoping that this will just be the beginning.

name: Alannah Carr
about: Something about me is that I spent last summer in South Africa, and I got to spend almost a week on safari in Krueger National Park. I got to see lions, giraffes, elephants and many other animals up close. I got to play with a lion cub!

name: Arman Askari Zadeh
about: Something about me is that I am an international student, and I came to the US when I was 17 years old. This was a hard but exciting experience for me. I needed to figure out everything by myself. There were many things that I didn't know about life which I learned when I came here and every day for me was a challenge and a new experience.

name: Samantha Mursuli
about: An interesting fact about me is that I am part Cuban and Mexican from my parents side of the family although I was born in the United States. This has given me the opportunity to travel to many places with family within these countries and explore the culture, food, and atmosphere. I have been on a road trip all around Mexico already and stopped at one major destination at every state.
